#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const int N = 1e4 + 5;


int test;
char s[N], t[N], ans[N];
long long k;

int main(){
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
        freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
//        freopen("output.txt", "w", stdout);
    #endif

    scanf("%d", &test);

    while (test--){
        scanf("%s", s);
        scanf("%lld", &k);
        int borrow = 0;

        int l = 0, n = strlen(s);
        reverse(s, s+n);
        while (k){
            t[l++] = k % 2 + '0';;
            k /= 2;
        }
        t[l] = '\0';
        for (int i = 0; i < min(n, l); ++i){
            borrow += s[i] + t[i] - 2*'0';
            ans[i] = borrow % 2 + '0';
            borrow /= 2;
        }
        if (l > n){
            for (int i = n; i < l; ++i){
                borrow += t[i] - '0';
                ans[i] = borrow%2 + '0';
                borrow /= 2;
            }
        }else{
            for (int i = l; i < n; ++i){
                borrow += s[i] - '0';
                ans[i] = borrow%2 + '0';
                borrow /= 2;
            }
        }

        l = max(l, n);
        while (borrow){
            ans[l++] = borrow%2 + '0';
            borrow /= 2;
        }

        ans[l] = '\0';
        reverse(ans, ans+l);
        printf("%s\n", ans);
    }

    return 0;
}
